00021 #include "DataGroupHeaderReader.h"
00022 #include "DataSetReader.h"
00023 #include "DataSetReaderTest.h"
00024 #include "FileHeaderReader.h"
00025 
00026 #define TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE "../data/test.file.data_dat"
00027 
00028 using namespace std;
00029 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00030 
00031 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetReaderTest );
00032 
00033 void DataSetReaderTest::setUp()
00034 {
00035         is.open(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00036 
00037         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00038         fhReader.Read();
00039 
00040         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00041         dchReader.ReadAll(is, fh, fhReader.GetDataGroupCnt());
00042 }
00043 
00044 void DataSetReaderTest::tearDown()
00045 {
00046         is.close();
00047         fh.Clear();
00048 }
00049 
00050 void DataSetReaderTest::CreationTest()
00051 {
00052         DataSetHeader& dph = fh.GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(0);
00053         DataSetReader reader(is, dph);
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void DataSetReaderTest::ReadDataSetTest()
00058 {
00059         DataSetHeader& dph = fh.GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(0);
00060         DataSetReader reader(is, dph);
00061 
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.GetDataSetName() == L"acquired data");
00063 
00064         int32_t rows = dph.GetRowCnt();
00065         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00066         {
00067                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00068                 u_int16_t value;
00069                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(value));
00070                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00071         }
00072 }
